author: Special Correspondent
title: Actor Kevin Bacon starts #IStayHomeFor challenge during Coronavirus lockdown
description: The Internet challenge has roped in Elton John, Emma Watson, David Beckham and more celebrities
content:
As different parts of the world engage in social distancing, lockdowns, isolations and quarantines, the number of stay at home challenges on the Internet has been on the rise. 
One of the more interesting ones is #IStayHomeFor, spearheaded by actor Kevin Bac… [+1506 chars]
